data.title: Rankin/Bass Productions
authors: Contributors to The Last Unicorn Wiki
data.meta_description: Rankin/Bass Productions, Inc., also known as Rankin/Bass Animated Entertainment or simply Rankin/Bass, was an American film production company specializing in stop motion animation, particularly focused on creating seasonal television specials, such as their inaugural production Rudolph the...
data.text: Rankin/Bass Productions, Inc., also known as Rankin/Bass Animated Entertainment or simply Rankin/Bass, was an American film production company specializing in stop motion animation, particularly focused on creating seasonal television specials, such as their inaugural production Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer. The Last Unicorn is one of very few productions that does not end with the iconic Rankin/Bass logo.
